summary: Completed comprehensive testing of BLOCK E - Telegram Admin Alerts + Cron Hardening implementation. All 28 tests passed (19 Vitest unit tests + 9 API integration tests). TelegramHardenedService successfully implements rate limiting (10/min, 60/hr), exponential backoff retry (3x), and deduplication (60s window). CronHardeningService implements distributed lock (5 min), idempotency (24hr), and timeout protection (10 min). All hardened API endpoints are functional and responding correctly. Telegram integration verified with successful test message delivery.
passed_tests: Vitest: TelegramHardenedService - message sending, deduplication, rate limiting, retry logic, stats tracking (8 tests)
Vitest: CronHardeningService - job execution, idempotency, distributed locking, timeout protection, history tracking (11 tests)
API: GET /api/fractal/v2.1/admin/telegram/health - returns ok: true, status: HEALTHY
API: GET /api/fractal/v2.1/admin/telegram/stats - returns stats object with all expected fields
API: POST /api/fractal/v2.1/admin/telegram/test-hardened - successfully sends test message
API: GET /api/fractal/v2.1/admin/cron/status - returns ok: true, stats, and locks
API: POST /api/fractal/v2.1/admin/jobs/daily-run-hardened - proper auth validation and job execution
API: POST /api/fractal/v2.1/admin/notify/startup - successfully sends startup notification
success_percentage: 100% backend (19/19 unit tests + 9/9 API tests = 28/28 total)
